summary: Dell is an American tech company that makes and sells computers, servers, and other electronics. It's part of Dell Technologies, a big company listed on the stock market. Dell is famous for selling computers directly to customers and making sure they get what they want. Over time, Dell has grown by buying other tech companies, like EMC, to offer more services like data storage and cloud computing. It's one of the largest PC sellers globally and a big company in Texas, ranking high on the Fortune 500 list.
title: Dell
